subject: Validate: S08 Delete Channel Audit - Critical UI Access Gap

acceptance_criteria: Delete channel option visible across all viewports
content.self_validation_notes: L2 Validation PASS - Circle thinking applied. Worker correctly identified that delete channel functionality is completely inaccessible via UI. Comprehensive evidence package with 30 screenshots. Authentication dependency properly documented. TDD methodology properly followed. Build and tests pass. Git commit 191069c verified.
